title: Bust of General Guillaume Brune
text: During the Napoleonic Wars of the late eighteenth and early nineteenth centuries, General Guillaume Brune served as Commander-in-Chief of French forces in Switzerland and Commander-in-Chief of the Army of Italy and the Ionian Islands.
description: General Brune, 1763-1815, was commander-in-chief of the army of Italy and of the French forces in Switzerland; in this portrait he wears \'petit uniforme\' of a general of an artillery division
creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund and the Putnam Dana McMillan Fund
